title: Will kayn icons return?
body: I was not playing league when kayn came out. I now main him and really want his shadow assassin icon. Is there any way of obtaining it or will they ever return?

replies.body: I couldn't say for sure, these icons were exclusive to missions during Kayn's release.  I don't really know if or when it would make a return, but you can also ask our devs directly via[ Ask Riot](https://ask.leagueoflegends.com/).
